operators.description: Total number of operators involved in this operation

machines_IDs.title: Machines IDs
machines_IDs.description: List of machines involved in this operation. Been in the same operation mean that all those machines start and end working with this operation scheduling

nature.title: Organisation
nature.description: If several machines are involve. Parallel: the machines are  independent (machines throughput add up). Serie: the machines done are inter-dependant (the machine with the minimal throughput limite the whole operation progress)
